title: The USB connection to computer on my Pixel 2 XL is not working
content:
On connecting the phone to the computer the error pops saying USB device connected malfunctioned.
Tried everything:
1. Updating and Reinstalling the USB Drivers.
2. Bought two new cables, both dint work.

Found a similar chain with 100's of users facing the same issue, but apparently the question has been locked now.
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/4524310?hl=en&authuser=1

Tried all the solutions posted on this chain.
Still nothing worked.

Have to say this again.
I am a big fan of Google, but...

This is a horrible user experience.
